descriptionHtml:
Grundle - A Netch Bull follower

Requirements: All DLC (Sorry poor people)

Can be found outside of the bulwark on Solstheim, right across from the farm.

Lore: A domesticated Netch is commonplace in the Dunmer mainland and wild Netch can be found along the coasts of Solstheim. Grundle, however, is a special case.
A stray since he was a calf, forever wandering the shores of both Morrowind and Solstheim. Intelligent and fierce, the only being that can "domesticate" such a creature is one such as the Dovakiin.

BEFORE YOU START DOWNLOADING!
Please note that this contains coarse language and is barely an alpha (Meaning that if you want quality, go away).
author: Caucasian616
